front.title: IEEE Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) -- Multi-Channel Operation

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Multi-channel wireless radio operations, Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) mode, medium access control (MAC), and physical layers (PHYs), including parameters for priority access, channel switching and routing, management services, and primitives designed for multi-channel operations are described in this standard.
